text: Since it is a many to one relationship from E1 to E2, therefore: 1. No entity in E1 can be related to more than one entity in E2. ( hence B is incorrect) 2. An entity in E2 can be related to more than one entity in E1.(hence C and D are incorrect). Option (A) is correct: Every entity in E1 is associated with exactly one entity in E2.
